Batocera for RG35XX

These pages describe the installation of a custom firmware (CFW) based on Batocera Linux for the Anbernic RG35XX console.

Project maintained by rg35xx-cfw Hosted on GitHub Pages — Theme by mattgraham

Getting Started

  • Read the introduction to learn more about this firmware.
  • Read the installation page to get started.
  • Read the Frequently Asked Questions for any questions you may have.

Latest development release

  • Download Latest Firmware Release
  • Check the ChangeLog

Support the project

There are multiple ways to collaborate with the project:

  • Participate on the discussions on the Retro Handhelds Discord page
  • Participate with testing and providing support
